items.content_html: This is a lightweight clone of a payment application, built with React and Express. It focuses on core functionalities like user registration, login, account management, and potentially money transfers (depending on your implementation). This is a great starting point to explore building real-world payment application features.
items.title: Prabal-verma/payment-app: This is a lightweight clone of a payment application, built with React and Express. It focuses on core functionalities like user registration, login, account management, and potentially money transfers (depending on your implementation). This is a great starting point to explore building real-world payment application features.
